Class AnimatableZoomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.gef.editparts.ZoomManager
      • uk.ac.mdx.xmf.swt.diagram.zoom.AnimatableZoomManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomZoomManager

    public class AnimatableZoomManager
extends org.eclipse.gef.editparts.ZoomManager
    The Class AnimatableZoomManager.
    Author:
    sshaw Overriden to fully support animated zoom.

          org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Point center)
        Allows implementators to zoom to a certain level centered around a given point.
        Parameters:
        zoom - double value where 1.0 represents 100%.
        center - Point around which the zoom will be centered in absolute coordinates
